scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace apps/frontend" "npm run dev --workspace apps/backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace packages/types && npm run build --workspace packages/utils && npm run build --workspace packages/config && npm run build --workspace packages/ui
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --workspace apps/frontend && npm run build --workspace apps/backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace apps/frontend && npm run lint --workspace apps/backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace apps/backend && npm run test --workspace apps/frontend
